device.title: Connect to a Xiaomi Miio Device or Xiaomi Gateway
device.description: You will need the 32 character [%key:common::config_flow::data::api_token%], see https://www.home-assistant.io/integrations/vacuum.xiaomi_miio/#retrieving-the-access-token for instructions. Please note, that this [%key:common::config_flow::data::api_token%] is different from the key used by the Xiaomi Aqara integration.
